drupalNodeEvent.title: Consulting in China: A Mutual Exploration of Similarity, Difference, and Synergy

field_speakers.processed:
• 王媛 Yuan Wang
  • 罗晶晶 Luo Jingjing
  • 吴玺 Wu Xi
  • 邹雨辰 Zou Yuchen
  • David Morgan Psychoanalyst BPAS BPA BPF

 

Chaired by: Jan Harvie Clark

field_description.processed:
Half-day conference exploring psychoanalysis in China

9.00am - 12.00pm, British Summer Time  or 5.00pm - 8.00pm Shanghai

 

Ticket holders will receive access to the recording (for 1 month) within 7 days of the event. 

David Morgan has been leading a workshop for the last two years for Chinese psychotherapists interested in Psychoanalysis. It has consisted of a mixture of supervision and teaching theory with invited analysts, such as Marcus Evans, Patrick Casement, and others.

Members of the group will present their thoughts about working in China and their experience of thinking psychoanalytically together.

 

Visit the link to the webpage on the Freud Museum website for further information and booking.
